bibl.title: The Antaiopolite Nome and its Administrative Changes under Roman Rule.
in collaboration with Lyla PINCH BROCK, Egyptology at the Dawn of the Twenty-first Century. Proceedings of the Eighth International Congress of Egyptologists, Cairo, 2000. Volume 2: History, Religion

bibl.note: The frontiers of the nomes of northern Sohag, west and east of the Nile in the Roman period.
bibl.seg: ABDEL GHANI Mohamed, The Antaiopolite Nome and its Administrative Changes under Roman Rule.

Zahi HAWASS (Ed.), in collaboration with Lyla PINCH BROCK, Egyptology at the Dawn of the Twenty-first Century. Proceedings of the Eighth International Congress of Egyptologists, Cairo, 2000. Volume 2: History, Religion (Cairo - New York, 2003) pp. 72-79.
